mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IMGBOARD JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = IMGBOARD.USER_ID WHERE DEL_YN IS NULL AND CATEGORY = #{category}
AND UPPER(U.USER_NIC) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{val}),'%')
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{val},'%')
AND (UPPER(U.USER_NIC) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{val}),'%') OR TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{val},'%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMGBOARD (TITLE, DRAWINFO, DRAWTIME, APPLY_DATE, USER_ID, DEL_YN, CATEGORY, IMG_PATH, IMG_NM) VALUES (#{title}, #{drawinfo}, #{drawtime}, NOW(), #{id}, #{temp}, #{category}, #{imgpath}, #{imgname})
mapper.update: UPDATE IMGBOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, DRAWINFO = #{drawinfo}, DRAWTIME = #{drawtime}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), DEL_YN = #{temp} WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT *, USER.USER_NIC AS AUTHOR FROM IMGBOARD JOIN USER ON IMGBOARD.USER_ID = USER.USER_ID WHERE RECOMMEND != 0 AND DEL_YN IS NULL ORDER BY RECOMMEND DESC, APPLY_DATE LIMIT 3
